1.0.0.name: wordpress/flickr-digest
1.0.0.description:
This plugin will digest your Flickr photos uploaded in last X days in a single post periodically. You can specifiy the digest post interval from administration panel.

The Flickr Digest Plugin features -

*   Customizable digest interval
*   Uses the Flickr API
*   Caption for the first photo (medium size)
*   Neat CSS design for displaying other photos (thumnail size)
*   Customizable diget post title,tags,category

I hope that you will enjoy the usability of this plugin, if you do , please rate this plugin.
